product.name: Home Brilliant Spring Decor 12x20 Pillow Cover Rectangle Striped Corduroy Solid Cushion Cover Throw Oblong Pillowcase for Lumbar, 12 x 20, Black
product.description:
is a design driven interior brand, offering trendy goods for your home with a natural feeling for every room in the house.
Our home decorative products add instant personality and can change the look of a room in a quick and easy way without having to completely redecorate.
Looking for ways to incorporate color into your home? Check Home Brilliant store page and find your favorite!
corduroy pillow covers
corduroy pillow covers
boho pillow covers
linen pillow covers
outdoor pillow covers
chenille pillow covers
faux fur pillow covers
product.bullet_points:
• 100% Polyester
• Imported
• Features: Color: Black. Measures: 12x20 inch (30x50cm), tailored for 12x20 inch insert
• Package: include 1 pc pillow cover. No pillow insert. Exquisite workmanship: we use zigzag sewing to avoid fraying or loosing thread
• Material: This supersoft, flocking striped corduroy pillow cover is made of 100% high quality polyester. This material does not pilling or shedding, and holding up well after long time of use
• Easy Insertion: we use matching shade invisible zipper closure for an elegant look. Zipper glides smoothly, it is easy access to insert or remove pillow inserts
• Washing Guide: Machine Wash Cold Separately, Gently Cycle Only, No Bleach, Tumble Dry Low. Easy case, No issue of shrinkage after multiple times of washes
• Vibrant Colors: Simple solid color can actually go with any decor style. Vivid colors for you to choose, adding some pop of color to your living space. Color may be different in different light or on different screen
• Versatile Applications: Suitable living room, garden, balcony, porch, bench, patio, sofa, car, chair, seat, couch, bed, office room, etc
• Perfect Gift: Treat yourself or surprise a loved one with these soft corduroy pillow covers. With their premium quality fabric and stylish design, they make a thoughtful and practical gift for housewarmings, birthdays, holidays, or any special occasion
• Fit for Different Material of Inserts: this pillow cover can fit for polyester, feather, cotton, down, goose down or wool pillow inserts

specifications.warranty_description: All products purchased have a 30-day warranty as standard. The warranty period begins on the day the product is originally shipped. The warranty covers all of the items and conditions identified in the original manufacturers warranty. Some of the items specifically not covered by the warranty are loss and theft, water damage, customer abuse.
specifications.product_care_instructions: Machine Wash, Machine Wash Cold Separately before FIRST USING. Gently Cycle Only, Dot Not Bleach, Tumble Dry Low or Hang to Dry, Do Not Iron. It is normal that there may be some floating objects during the first cleaning.
